sourcesContent:
import "./product-card.styles.scss" import Button from "../button/button.component" import { CartItemContext } from "../../context/cartItem.context" import { useContext } from "react" const ProductCard = ({product}) => { const {id,name, price, imageUrl} = product const {items,setItems} = useContext(CartItemContext) const handleClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const cartItems = [...items] cartItems.push(product) setItems(cartItems) console.log(cartItems.includes(product.id)); console.log(items); } return
{name} {price}
} export default ProductCard
